scripts.test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --detach --name tmpDB -p 5433:5432 test-db && sleep 5 && export NODE_ENV=test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx jest . --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit && docker rm tmpDB -f
scripts.migrate:dev: docker-compose run --rm -e NODE_ENV=development server npx sequelize db:migrate
scripts.seed:dev: docker-compose run --rm -e NODE_ENV=development server sh -c 'npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all'
